data.name: Error_CudaVersionFail
data.value: Startup Failed::Your CUDA version appears to be out of date. Please ensure you have the latest video drivers installed and try again.

data.name: Error_DllNotFound
data.value: DLL Not Found::A required .dll file could not be found. Please try reinstalling Fractron 9000. Please also ensure you have the latest drivers installed for your video card.

data.name: Error_EngineCycle
data.value: Fractal Engine Error::Uh-oh, the rendering engine has crashed. This may be caused by invalid settings, or possibly a bug.

data.name: Error_EngineStartupFail
data.value:
Startup Failed::The fractal engine could not start. Please try the following:
1. Make sure you have Microsoft's .NET Framework 2.0 installed. It can be downloaded for free at: http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/details.aspx?familyid=0856eacb-4362-4b0d-8edd-aab15c5e04f5&displaylang=en
2. Make sure you have the latest drivers for your video card. Nvidia drivers can be downloaded at: http://www.nvidia.com/Download/index.aspx?lang=en-us AMD/ATI drivers can be downloaded at: http://support.amd.com/us/gpudownload/Pages/index.aspx
3. Try choosing a different rendering device from the configuration dialog in the edit menu.
If Fractron 9000 still won't start, it is most likely due to a bug. Fractron is still under development, so future versions should be more stable.

data.name: Error_FlameLoadFailed
data.value: Library Load Failed::Could not open the .flame library file "{0}".

data.name: Error_FlameSaveFailed
data.value: Library Save Failed::Could not save the .flame library file to "{0}".

data.name: Error_FractalOpenFailed
data.value: Fractal Load Failed::The fractal file failed to open. The file may be corrupt.

data.name: Error_ImageSaveFailed
data.value: Image Save Failed::Could not save image "{0}".

data.name: Error_InitConfigLoadFailed
data.value: Initial Configuration Failed::Failed to perform initial configuration. Attempting to continue.

data.name: Error_NoDevicesFound
data.value: No Compatible Hardware Found::Fractron 9000 couldn't find any compatable rendering devices. Make sure you have the latest video drivers installed. Click on "Help" -> "Hardware Info" for details.

data.name: Error_OpenGLVersion
data.value: Required OpenGL Version Not Found::Fractron 9000 requires {0} version {1} or higher. The currently installed version is version {2}. Updating your video card drivers may solve this problem.

data.name: Error_OutOfMemory
data.value: Out of Video Memory::Uh-oh, it looks like Fractron 9000 has run out of video memory. To fix this, open the Configuration dialog from the Edit menu and try lowering the custom output resolution. Closing the program and restarting may also help.

data.name: Error_Unknown
data.value: Unknown Error::An unknown error has occured.

data.name: Info_Description
data.value:
Fractron 9000 is a high performance fractal flame renderer. Fractron 9000 takes advantage of modern programmable graphics processors to dramatically speed up rendering.
Currently, Fractron 9000 supports rendering through OpenCL, NVidia CUDA, and OpenGL 2.0.

data.name: Info_LicenseBrief
data.value: This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.
